org.openhubframework.openhub.api.common

Interface EmailService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:

    Author:
    Petr Juza

    • Method Detail

      • sendEmailToAdmins

        void sendEmailToAdmins(String subject,
                     String body)
        Sends email to administrators.
        Parameters:
        subject - the subject
        body - the body

      • sendFormattedEmail

        void sendFormattedEmail(String recipients,
                      String subject,
                      String body,
                      Object... values)
        Sends formatted email to recipients.

        For example, message "Hi {}. My name is {}.", "Alice", "Bob" will return the string "Hi Alice. My name is Bob.".

        Parameters:
        recipients - the comma separated recipients; if empty then email won't be send
        subject - the subject
        body - the body with possible placeholders {}
        values - the values for placeholders; count of values have to correspond with count of placeholders
